name: Rhythm Run (Pendulym, emwav3)
description:
RHYTHM RUN by Lawrence Foley & Ryan Eads

Evade the police in style with this short and musical platformer - just be sure to keep your hoverboard charged!

---
Dev Notes

This entirely original game was designed and built, almost entirely, within a two-week span for the 2019 Cyberpunk Game Jam. Though we missed the submission deadline, we're proud to say that we finished what the game we set out to make.  With any game (especially one made for a jam), there are things we wish we'd done differently.

Art & Design by Lawrence Foley & Ryan Eads
Programming by Lawrence Foley
Music by Ryan Eads

---
